snippet.title: Mexico 1921: A Deep Slumber - Official Trailer | IGN Live 2024
snippet.description:
Check out the trailer for the upcoming game, Mexico 1921: A Deep Slumber-- Immerse yourself in post revolutionary Mexico City. An emotional and intriguing narrative adventure video game about the awakening of a country. Mexico 1921: A Deep Slumber is coming Fall 2024 to Xbox and PC via Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive
